page.title: 08LEISURE IN LYVEDEN 1
page.content:
Lyveden, being a rural area with only six houses is very limited, activities wise.After speaking to some people at Lyveden,we found that the main leisure pursuits are pheasant shooting, bird and deer watching. There is some fox-hunting.
{PHEASANT SHOOTING Pheasant shooting is held once every year and this lasts about a week or so. The shoots are held and organised by the Duke of Gloucester's estate.The shoot is open to those who can afford to take part.The local people either spectate or act as beaters.
{BIRD WATCHING Bird watching is a more popular hobby, on which tourists often come to spend a day with their binoculars and flasks.
